array.question: Are your snacks gluten-free?
array.answer: Some of our products are gluten-free! Check the packaging for the "Gluten-Free" label or visit our Products Page for details.

array.question: Where can I buy your snacks?
array.answer: Our snacks are available in supermarkets, convenience stores, and online retailers. Use our Store Locator to find the nearest seller.

array.question: Do you use artificial flavors or preservatives?
array.answer: No! We pride ourselves on using natural ingredients and avoid artificial additives. Our snacks are made for real flavor lovers.

array.question: Are your products suitable for vegans?
array.answer: Many of our snacks are vegan-friendly. Look for the "Vegan" badge on the packaging or check the ingredients list.

array.question: How should I store your snacks for maximum freshness?
array.answer: Keep them in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Once opened, reseal the bag tightly or transfer to an airtight container.

array.question: Do you offer bulk/wholesale orders?
array.answer: Yes! Contact our sales team at sales@yourcompany.com for bulk pricing and distribution options.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to [Company Name]. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website, products, and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

sections.title: Definitions
sections.content:
Key terms used in this agreement:
- 'Company', 'We', 'Us' refers to [Company Name].
- 'Products' means our snack foods and related goods.
- 'Website' means [yourwebsite.com].

sections.title: Purchases and Orders
sections.content: All orders are subject to product availability. We reserve the right to limit quantities and refuse service. Prices are subject to change without notice.

sections.title: Returns and Refunds
sections.content: Due to the perishable nature of our products, we generally do not accept returns. Refunds may be issued at our discretion for damaged or defective items.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: [Company Name] shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from product use. Maximum liability is limited to the purchase price of the product.

sections.title: Allergen Information
sections.content: Our products may contain allergens including wheat, milk, soy, and nuts. While we follow strict procedures, we cannot guarantee allergen-free production environments.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on our website including logos, packaging designs, and product names are our exclusive property. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These terms shall be governed by the laws of [Country/State]. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of [Jurisdiction].

sections.title: Changes to Terms
sections.content: We may update these terms periodically. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content:
For questions about these terms, contact us at:
Email: legal@yourcompany.com
Address: [Your Company Address]

terms.acceptanceText: By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to these Terms and Conditions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: At [Company Name], we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website or purchase our products.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content:
We may collect:
- Contact details (name, email, phone)
- Delivery addresses
- Payment information
- Purchase history
- Website usage data (cookies, IP address)

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
Your data helps us to:
- Process orders and deliveries
- Improve our products
- Send marketing communications (with consent)
- Comply with legal requirements

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking
sections.content:
We use cookies to:
- Remember cart items
- Analyze website traffic
- Personalize your experience
You can manage cookies in your browser settings.

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.content:
We only share data with:
- Payment processors
- Delivery partners
- Legal authorities when required
We never sell your personal information.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content:
We implement:
- SSL encryption
- Secure payment gateways
- Restricted staff access
- Regular security audits

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content:
We retain your information:
- For active customers: 5 years
- For order records: 7 years (tax compliance)
- For marketing lists: Until you unsubscribe

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content:
You have the right to:
- Access your data
- Request corrections
- Delete your account
- Opt-out of marketing
- Withdraw consent

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13. Parents may contact us to review or delete any accidental collections.

sections.title: Policy Updates
sections.content: We may update this policy periodically. Significant changes will be notified via email or website notices.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content:
For privacy concerns:
Email: privacy@yourcompany.com
Address: [Your Company Address]
Phone: [Customer Service Number]

privacy.acceptanceText: By using our services, you acknowledge our privacy practices as described in this policy.
